oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Schr\"odinger Quantization Problem and Neutron Stars
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fiziev, Plamen P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quantum Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We are discussing the possibility to find a proper unique conditions for an experimental study of the Schr\"odinger quantization problem in the neutron stars physics. A simple toy model for physically different quantizations is formulated and a possible physical consequences are derived.
Comment: 10 pages, Latex file, no figures
